page.title: 06PORT OF MENTEITH TOURISM
page.content: Tourism has become an important industry in this area.The facilities for the tourist consist of the Lake Hotel,Lochend Chalets and several farms which do Bed and Breakfast. People come for the quietness and natural beauty of the countryside,for fishing and to a lesser extent shooting (pheasant and deer). Tourism in Scotland is co-ordinated by the Scottish Tourist Board which was set up in 1982 and is funded with Government money. Under them come the area Tourist Board of which ours, the Loch Lomond,Stirling and Trossachs Tourist Board is one.This is made up of representatives of the council, the traders and Scottish Tourist Board in equal parts.This body is responsible for advertising. They are now allowed to advertise overseas.
